Callback12Header: Bring the ancient weapon to Gerti
Phase13Description: I have recovered an ancient Barbarian sword made of Arreat steel. I should take it to Gerti in Ked Bardu.
Phase8Description: To help the Crane Tribe survive, Ealda needs to mend their relationship with the other Barbarian Tribes starting with Oxen. She wants me to recover an Arreat steel weapon from Ancient's Lament and gift it to Gerti.
Toast: Help Ealda of the Crane Tribe mend their relationship with the Oxen Tribe.
Name: Worthy of Arreat
